Bash(gh pr create --title "Fix: Skip Search API calls when unauthenticated" --body "$(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary
- GitHub''s Search API requires authentication to query by `author:`, `reviewed-by:`, etc.
- Without a token, these queries return "Validation Failed" errors
- Added `is_authenticated` flag to `ActivityCollector` to skip these calls gracefully
- Shows clear message to users explaining the limitation

## Test plan
- [x] Run tests (18 passed)
- [x] Manually test without `GITHUB_TOKEN` - confirms skip message appears
EOF
)")
